name: Tempest Domain
description: Clerics of the Tempest Domain channel divine wrath through thunder and lightning, crushing foes beneath storms and driving enemies back with explosive force.

1.name: Tempest Domain Spells
1.description: You always have certain spells prepared at specific cleric levels.

1.name: Bonus Proficiencies
1.description: You gain proficiency with martial weapons and heavy armor.

1.name: Wrath of the Storm
1.description: When a creature hits you with a melee attack, you can deal lightning or thunder damage to it on a failed save.

2.name: Channel Divinity: Destructive Wrath
2.description: When you roll lightning or thunder damage, you can choose to deal maximum damage instead.

6.name: Thunderbolt Strike
6.description: When you deal lightning damage to a Large or smaller creature, you can push it.

8.name: Divine Strike
8.description: Once on each of your turns when you hit with a weapon attack, you deal extra thunder damage.

17.name: Stormborn
17.description: You gain a flying speed while not underground or indoors.
